title: Drive Me Crazy (The Hatcher & Willis Families)
description: Distracted. Disturbed. Unhinged.Crazy.Yeah, that’s the best word for it. Just one glance at Harper Jennings drives me crazy.She’s my best friend’s sister, and sneaking around with her was the most exciting thing in the world — until it wasn’t.When our secrets come to light, we soon learn life’s messy, and so is love. Faced with her mortality, my mere existence as a man is reduced to nothing.That was then and this is now.I may have been the one to walk away eight years ago, but I’ll be damned if I do it again. My craving for her is stronger than ever, and like it or not, she wants me, too. I did what I had to back then for her.Now, I’ll do what I damn well please for us.The point is… we can’t help who we fall in love with. Even if it drives us crazy, I’ll make her mine.
author: Leaona Luxx
